title: SpikeStat
description: SpikeStat is a social media site that allows users to track Spikeball games and share them with friends. SpikeStat allows users to post, like, comment, and follow.

title: CryptMSG
description: CryptMSG is a messaging platform that allows users to sign in and message other users.

title: Twitter Phishing Site
description: A group final project for CS366: Introduction to Cybersecurity. This is a clone of the Twitter login system meant as a Phishing attack aimed to gain access to the victims twitter account without their knowledge. The victim is prompted to input their username and password and in completion would be redirected back to the real Twitter login page, perhaps causing them to think the login failed and would try again. This demo only alerts the user their username and password and does nothing more.

title: CS452 Final Project
description: My final project for CS452: Computer Graphics. I created a scene using OpenGL and Blender.
